bibdata.title: IEEE Guide to the Installation of Overhead Transmission Line Conductors
IEEE Guide to the Installation of Overhead Transmission Line Conductors

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: General recommendations for the selection of methods, equipment, and tools that have been found to be practical for the stringing of overhead transmission line conductors and overhead groundwires are provided. The aim is to present in one document sufficient details of present day methods, materials, and equipment to outline the basic considerations necessary to maintain safe and adequate control of conductors during stringing operations.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
